text:
Hi - Does anyone from HubSpot know if errors from the design manager will be implemented on hs watch. EG
Something which has puzzled me for a while, I found the error in design manager..
`Warning:45:27HubL in your CSS or JavaScript won't be parsed, except for the module_asset_url function`
Great question! This is something we have been talking about. <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-cms-tools/issues/235> is the issue for it if you want to :heart: it to upvote!
thanks for the added context. improving the workflow when it comes to making big changes like this is on our radar.
